strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_DESCRIPTION:
The Nemesis Captain issues orders to control the battlefield and fight safely from behind his Adaptive Microbots.

<color=#CCD3E0>< ! > Keep your cool. Using Orders too quickly will build Stress, leaving you vulnerable.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, lighting up a fresh smoke.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_OUTRO_FAILURE: ..and so he vanished, retired at last.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_LORE: This planet sucks man.. *takes hit from cigar*
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_STRESSPASSIVE_NAME: idk what to call half of this stuff or how to present it to the player
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_STRESSPASSIVE_DESC: Gain <style=cIsHealth>Stress</style> while in danger. When Stress reaches maximum, temporarily become <style=cIsHealth>Overstressed</style>, reducing <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style>, <style=cIsUtility>armor</style>, and <style=cIsDamage>damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_KEYWORD_STRESS: <style=cKeywordName>Stress</style><style=cSub>Gain Stress by being surrounded by enemies, receiving damage, or using Orders. Reduce Stress by dealing Critical Strikes, healing, killing enemies, using certain Orders, and being out of combat.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_KEYWORD_OVERSTRESS: <style=cKeywordName>Overstress</style><style=cSub>Become subjected to the effects of maximum Stress, as well as -30% movement speed, -20 armor, and -50% damage until the Stress meter counts down to 0.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Rapidly fire for <style=cIsDamage>90% damage</style> per bullet. Can hold up to 20 bullets.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_SECONDARY_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Arm your cane rifle, then fire a shot for <style=cIsDamage>680% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_PUNCH_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Throw a punch in front for <style=cIsDamage>150% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_HAIDARA_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Shocking</style>. Discharge a thunderbolt in front for <style=cIsDamage>440% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_ORDERS_DESCRIPTION: Deploy 1 of 4 <style=cIsUtility>Microbot Orders</style>. Using Orders increases <style=cIsHealth>Stress</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Hold the key</style> of an Order to <style=cIsUtility>discard</style> it.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_ORDERNULL_DESCRIPTION: Devise a new plan of attack, slightly increasing <style=cIsHealth>Stress</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_ORDERSTRIKE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>Stunning</style>. Aim a Microbot and fire a laser, <style=cIsDamage>exploding</style> for <style=cIsDamage>1400% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_ORDERSTRIKETRIPLE_DESCRIP: <style=cIsUtility>Stunning</style>. Aim a Microbot and fire a laser, <style=cIsDamage>exploding</style> for <style=cIsDamage>600% damage</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Can be fired 3 times.</style>
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_ORDERSTRIKEFROST_DESCRIPT: <style=cIsUtility>Freezing</style>. Aim a Microbot and fire a laser, <style=cIsDamage>exploding</style> for <style=cIsDamage>1100% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_ORDERSTRIKESHOCK_DESCRIPT: <style=cIsUtility>Shocking</style>. Aim a Microbot and fire a laser, <style=cIsDamage>exploding</style> for <style=cIsDamage>900% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_ORDERREGEN_DESCRIPTION: Temporarily increase the rate at which Stress decreases for <style=cIsUtility>15 seconds</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_ORDERREDUCE_DESCRIPTION: Temporarly decrease the amount of Stress gained from all sources by <style=cIsUtility>50%</style> for <style=cIsUtility>10 seconds.</style>
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_ORDERRECOVER_DESCRIPTION: Massively decrease your current amount of stress, while also <style=cIsUtility>discarding all other Orders</style>. Stress removed is increased per Order lost.
strings.SS2_NEMCAPTAIN_ORDERHEAL_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsHealing>Heal</style> nearby allies for </style>6%</style> of their <style=cIsHealth>maximum health</style> every second, and also grant <style=cIsUtility>50 armor</style> and <style=cIsDamage>+20% attack speed</style> for <style=cIsUtility>12 seconds</style.
